rows.label: qst300410_msg001
rows.name: ヴァンダムの墓の前で誓い

rows.label: qst300410_msg0002
rows.name:
I just wanted to take a moment to
report in to old Vandham together
with you guys.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0004
rows.name:
We never properly appreciated
how much you did for us until you
weren't around any more.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0005
rows.name:
Organizing all our missions, managing
the rations, balancing the manpower...
There's no end to it, really.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0006
rows.name:
At first, we weren't sure how to go on
without you. But by working together,
I think we've managed to pull through!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0008
rows.name:
I'm afraid I still don't remember the
days I spent fighting by your side.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0009
rows.name:
But watching Rex, his friends, and the
people of this village, it's easy to see
how great a man you must've been.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0010
rows.name:
I don't know if I can really carry on
your legacy, but I swear I'll keep these
people safe. You can count on that.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0011
rows.name:
Old man, the mercenary band you
started isn't going away any time soon.
We'll keep it going just as strong...

rows.label: qst300410_msg0012
rows.name:
No, we'll build it up until it's ten times
stronger than the day you left it!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0013
rows.name:
So don't you worry about us.
Rest your old bones in peace,
you hear?

rows.label: qst300410_msg0014
rows.name:
This kid Rex you brought us is one
heckuva leader. So we're good.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0015
rows.name:
Right, I think that should be enough
to satisfy the old man!

rows.label: qst300410_msg0016
rows.name:
Thanks for joining us for this.
It meant a lot to me.

rows.label: qst300410_msg0017
rows.name: And keep up the good work, boss!
